official_title: To prohibit wholesalers from purchasing prescription drugs from pharmacies, and to enhance information and transparency regarding drug wholesalers engaged in interstate commerce.
short_title: Gray Market Drug Reform and Transparency Act of 2013
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services
Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

titles.title: Gray Market Drug Reform and Transparency Act of 2013
To prohibit wholesalers from purchasing prescription drugs from pharmacies, and to enhance information and transparency regarding drug wholesalers engaged in interstate commerce.
